Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute at 87th/Central Park
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Southwest Highway, Lawndale and 87th: due to, street blockage near 87th/Central Park.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Cumberland
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Cumberland due to a sick passenger. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Cumberland due to a sick passenger.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
